type.description:
apoli:add_block
Adds a block at the specified action position. Adding means setting the block at the position, offset by the direction of the action.
Block Action Types operate an action at a selected block or set of blocks. These are available to power/action types that provides a block_action object field.
type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:add_block`
Adds a block at the specified action position. Adding means setting the block at the position, offset by the direction of the action.
## Block Action Type
Block Action Types operate an action at a selected block or set of blocks. These are available to power/action types that provides a block_action object field.

[Block Action Types Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/)

block.description: The namespace and ID of the block to place.
